ModMetaData.name: WarCasket Barbatos Gundam Addon (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Tach/XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Gundam Barbatos WarCasket armour. Includes the iconic Mace, Katana, and 300mm Smoothbore Rifle as weapons.
- Movement speed offsets changed from a debuff to a buff. All armor pieces provide 0.25c/s move speed increase. - This applies to 1.4 users ONLY! 1.3 version values are unaltered.
- Toxic Resistance and Environmental Toxic Resistance Values applied to all 4 pieces of armor. - This applies to 1.4 users ONLY! 1.3 version values are unaltered.
- Whether you are still on 1.3, or version 1.4, you can use this mod! I will do my best to address any issues you may find with it.
- The original mod can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2764647883
-------------------------------------------
- This is considered a temporary upload.
- If the author wishes at any time to continue the project, or for me to remove it from the workshop, I will comply with their request.
- XxHyde840xX
